author: karenhuang

comments.content: There is an uncanny resemblance with [The Font Bureau](http://web.archive.org/wiki/The%20Font%20Bureau)’s [Agenda Bold](http://web.archive.org/web/20051123010833/http:/www.fontshop.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=catalog.fontdetail&displayfontid=FB.111346.0.4&attributes.sampleSize=288&sampleText=brix&sampleSize=144&attributes.paraSize=14&paraSize=14) — check the dot on the _i_ — but the _b_ nor the _r_ match. :-/
What the!? The Agenda sample on MyFonts matches, but the one on FontShop.com doesn’t!?
Yes, that’s it guys. What would I do without typophile?

Yves, could this font have been updated without fanfare?

The b and r sure look different on the two sites.
